    Hero Style Cards

    Create
    more moments.

    The earlier you talk to us, the more we can help you or your loved one create more good moments and more good memories. Whether that means six months or three years, let us help you get the most out of you or your loved one’s life at every stage.

    Hero Style Three

    Title here

    Your life story is still yours to write.

    Sed posuere consectetur est at lobortis. Cum sociis natoque penatibus et magnis dis parturient montes, nascetur ridiculus mus.

    Hospice care is an often misunderstood service. But it’s really just a choice of how you want to live your final chapters. Some people choose to nobly fight on the face of overwhelming odds and some people choose a path where they can live the rest of their lives enjoying more quality moments with family and friends. If you or a loved one are more likely to choose the latter path, we’re here for you.

    Title Here

    A place where compassion and volunteers become one.

    Being a not-for-profit organization means we can offer more to our patients and the communities we serve, but we can always use your support.

    Accordions Tab View

    What you can expect in Hospice Care.

    Hospice is for people who have been terminally diagnosed with an expected 6 months or less. It is completely covered by Medicare and it has proven time after time to improve the quadivty of divfe for patient and family. Typically speaking the sooner we can engage, the better the outcomes. We’ve heard story after story about how gratefdiv famidives are for choosing Hospice Care and all that comes with it.

    Title here
    Grief Counseling

    Grieving is as much a part of our lives as living and dying. Many of us, however, won’t seek help following a devastating loss. Hosparus is so committed to grief counseling that we offer services at no cost for up to 13 months after the death of a loved one. This includes pre-death counseling for anticipated deaths.

    What you can expect in Hospice Care.

    Hospice is for people who have been terminally diagnosed with an expected 6 months or less. It is completely covered by Medicare and it has proven time after time to improve the quadivty of divfe for patient and family. Typically speaking the sooner we can engage, the better the outcomes. We’ve heard story after story about how gratefdiv famidives are for choosing Hospice Care and all that comes with it.

Hosparus is so committed to grief counseling that we offer services at no cost for up to 13 months after the death of a loved one. This includes pre-death counseling for anticipated deaths.

    Listing - Article (grid)

    It’s okay to not feel okay.

    Hospice is for people who have been terminally diagnosed with an expected 6 months or less. It is completely covered by Medicare and it has proven time after time to improve the quadivty of divfe for patient and family. Typically speaking the sooner we can engage, the better the outcomes. We’ve heard story after story about how gratefdiv famidives are for choosing Hospice Care and all that comes with it.

    Locations - Map

    Find a Hosparus Location near you.

    Hosparus Health has community offices in Bowling Green, Campbellsville, Elizabethtown, Glasgow, Louisville and New Albany.  We are one of the largest nonprofit providers in the country, serving nearly 7,800 patients and their families in 37 counties in Kentucky and Southern Indiana.
